pdf.title: Structural analysis of a bileaflet mechanical heart valve prosthesis with curved leaflet * Young Joo Kwon Department of Mechano-Informatics & Design Engineering, Hongik University 300 Shinan-ri, Chochiwon-eup, Yeonki-gun, Choongnam 339-701, S. Korea
